author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed CSS property change in some complex cases.
2) Fixed a problem in transparency detection for Gradients with NO_REPEAT
3) Fixed a bug with getURL when passed a function using scoping.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed notification of change ofwith properties under some circumstances.
2) Fixed some issues with documents lacking a base URI.
3) Composite graphics nodes no longer invalidate when
their visibility changes (their children will if it propogates).

author: deweese
msg: Fixed broken links to installing.html (should be install.html).
